channel.title: Tidytext on Kimberly Staudt
channel.description: Recent content in Tidytext on Kimberly Staudt

item.title: How to Create a Word Cloud
item.description: What is a Word Cloud? A word cloud is an image composed of words whose size is determined by the frequency in which they appear. Today, we will be creating a word cloud from the Tame Impala album, Currents. First, create a word text file, and save the lyrics (no titles) in that file. Save both this file and a new R script file in the same directory. Now we can begin.
